double bdsp::filter::HP2_SallenKey_TPT::process ( double  x)

Definition at line 31 of file HP2_SallenKey_TPT.cpp.

32  {
33  // Calculate input to low-pass chain
34 
35  const double s_bar = (-hp[0].get_state() * g1 - hp[1].get_state()) / (1.0 + g);
36  const double u = (x - k * s_bar) / (1.0 - k * g2);
37 
38  // Calculate output by processing high-pass chain
39 
40  double y = u;
41 
42  for (int n = 0; n < 2; ++n)
43  {
44  y = hp[n].process(y);
45  }
46 
47  return y;
48  }
